captions.text: -Yo, yo, yo, it's A to the O,
back with a December to dismember! [laughs]
-Yeech, I'd better "cut" to the chase already. [laughs]
"Do you ever wish you were a toy?"
Whoa! I'm like Pinocchio in reverse.
I always wanted to be a real toy. [laughs]
-Okay, fruit fans. Let's get to the questions!
-(announcer) "Hey Orange, are you annoying on purpose?"
-(announcer) "If there were zombies in the kitchen,
-No! Don't start the timer! Please, don't start the timer!
-What are you doing? Stop it! No!
has a screaming rainbow ever attacked you?"
-Hmm... I better let Pear handle this one.
-Hey, I just figured out the answer to this equation.
-I don't know. Click it and see!
-(announcer) "What happened to Midget Apple's machine gun?"
-(announcer) "Is Marshmallow a boy or a girl for crying out loud,
-Okay, okay. I know everyone wants an answer,
so I'm gonna stop toying around...
-I'm not a boy or a girl.
-He's where he always is: in da house.
-(announcer) Tigertot11 asks, "Have you ever tamed a tiger?"
-It's something I've wanted to give you for a very long time.
-What is it, Orange? Just tell me.
Well, that does it for now,
but make sure to leave a question
in the comment area below for next time.
Oh! And don't forget to pick up the new
Annoying Orange toys in stores now!
make sure to head over to Facebook picture contest.
Just upload picture of you with one of my toys or T-shirts
for a chance to win an iPad.
